definition: round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: EG:Another effort entails bringing the entire community into the post-ColdWar era.
sentences.chinese: 大家也在努力使整個智囊團進入加速冷戰時期。

sentences.english: In particular, the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act (FISA) is vital to the community's mission against terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 尤其外國信息監督法案對於智囊團反恐任務至關重要。

sentences.english: They must act as the judges of the Eldar, and not just their intelligence agency.
sentences.chinese: 他們不只是埃達族的智囊團，而且還是他們的審判長。

sentences.english: Conservative think-tanks have the same dream of return to a prelapsarian innocence.
sentences.chinese: 保守派智囊團都夢想着能夠回到過去天真無邪的日子。

sentences.english: RAND thinks these savings are probably smaller, about $300m.
sentences.chinese: 蘭特智囊團認爲儲金也許會少一些，大約有3億美元。

sentences.english: Another effort entails bringing the entire community into the post-ColdWar era.
sentences.chinese: 大家也在努力使整個智囊團進入加速冷戰時期。

sentences.english: He was a co-founder of the think tank Demos.
sentences.chinese: 同時他曾是德莫斯智囊團的聯合創始人。

sentences.english: The inharmonious working atmosphere can counteract the efficiency of the think tank.
sentences.chinese: 不和諧的工作氣氛，將會抵消智囊團的效率。

sentences.english: Top mounted, non-contacting for simple tank and open air level measurements.
sentences.chinese: 頂式，非簡單的智囊團和露天水平測量接觸。

sentences.english: At least people now know that Thinktank = Propaganda.
sentences.chinese: 最少人們現在知道智囊團等於宣傳組織。

sentences.english: Be sure to wash the gravel thoroughly before adding it to your tank.
sentences.chinese: 一定要洗砂石徹底煮熟纔可添加到您的智囊團。

sentences.english: In early June he will unveil his new team.
sentences.chinese: 六月初他的智囊團將會公開亮相。

sentences.english: Tarkin entrusted the protection of a top-secret military think-tank installation to Daala.
sentences.chinese: 塔金委託達拉保護一個極機密的軍事智囊團基地。

sentences.english: What useful idea ever came out of a think-tank?
sentences.chinese: 智囊團是否提出過什麼有用的意見呢？

sentences.english: As a member of www. myoic. com think tank, Our often comes up with good ideas.
sentences.chinese: 作爲點子俱樂部智囊團的一員，我們經常想出好點子。

definition: to put forward plans and ideas (also derogatory)/to give advice (idiom)

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3
